timeline.message:
Replace deprecated Assert.assertThat(...) with MatcherAssert.assertThat(...)

Motivation:

junit deprecated Assert.assertThat(...)

Modifications:

Use MatcherAssert.assertThat(...) as replacement for deprecated method

Result:

Less deprecation warnings
